class libboutique.services.packagekit.packagekit_service.PackageKitService(progress_publisher=None)[source]¶

Service that takes care of: * Install a package * List installed packages * Uninstall a package * Search for a package

class libboutique.services.snap.snap_service.SnapService(progress_publisher=None)[source]¶

Interface with PyObject Snapd.

it takes care of : * install snaps * list installed snaps * remove a snap * help search for a snap using:

  • package name
